price: 14. (It will be said to him): "Read your book. You yourself are sufficient as a reckoner against you this Day."
arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: iq'ra kitābaka kafā binafsika al-yawma ʿalayka ḥasīban
